Beats Per Minute.description: set the Beats Per Minute [1..300]; default is 120

Beats in a Bar.description: set the Beats in a Bar [1..6]; default is 4

Flatten modifier.description: flatten all operations on a musical object to a new sequence

Integer Index Map modifier.description: create a Mapper of Notes by index (1-based)

Join modifier.description: join two or more musical objects

Loop runner.description: begin loop(s). Ignore if it was running.

MIDI channel modifier ; must be a top-le.description: select a MIDI channel, must be in [0..16]

Note creator.description: create a Note from the note notation

Parallel modifier.description: create a new sequence in which all notes of a musical object are synched in time

Pitch modifier.description: change the pitch with a delta of semitones

Player (background).description: play all musical objects in parallel

Player (foreground).description: play musical objects such as Note,Chord,Sequence,...

Recorder.description: creates a recorded sequence of notes from a MIDI device

Repeat modifier.description: repeat the musical object a number of times

Reverse modifier.description: reverse the (groups of) notes in a sequence

Sequence creator.description: create a Sequence from (space separated) notes

Serial modifier.description: serialise any parallelisation of notes in a musical object

Undo dynamic modifier.description: undynamic all the notes in a musical object

controls softness.description: set the base velocity [1..127]; default is 70

the notes being played.description: echo the notes being played; default is true
